Question: Yongkang Chic Intelligent Technology Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Yongkang Chic Intelligent Technology Co.,Ltd

Product 1: Electric Scooter
 - Specialization in manufacturing
 - Part of a range of e-mobility products

Product 2: Self-Balancing Scooter (Hoverboard)
 - Over 25 years of experience
 - UL2272/CE Certified

Product 3: ATV
 - Included in the product lineup

Product 4: Dirt Bikes
 - Part of their extensive product range

General Features:
 - Direct manufacturer with a focus on innovation and quality
 - Offers custom manufacturing services with R&D and supply chain capabilities
 - Significant presence in the e-mobility market with a top 3 hoverboard supplier status in China
